nodes.text: Imagine how many other countless incidents of police brutality and murder are not being caught on tape. #TheReidOut https://t.co/6VgNfcGIfY
@HeyNikki1 Almost each day various names pop up of victims of police brutality…..cases not known to the 🌍 because they weren’t caught on video. There’s so many names we just don’t know…..
